last_episode_to_air.name: Kansen 2: Inzai Toshi
last_episode_to_air.overview:
This is a continuation of Kansen's story: Inyoku no Rensa

The story where Hiroshi, Yuuki, Hayami and his school friends are doing a Study Tour. Suddenly while on the way there was a big explosion that destroyed all the cities. At that time the spread of the virus occurred very quickly through sex. How do they survive in this sex virus incident?
